Run AI Segmentation Workflow

Source: R/runAIsegmentation.R
runAIsegmentation.Rd

This function executes the full AI segmentation workflow, including reading input files, merging segments, BAF processing, and writing results.

Usage

runAIsegmentation(
  seg,
  cov,
  ai,
  gender,
  out_dir,
  prefix,
  aibinsize = 5e+05,
  mergeai = 0.2,
  mergecov = 0.2,
  minaisize = 1e+06,
  snpmin = 7,
  minsnpcallaicutoff = 10,
  mergecovminsize = 5e+05
)

Arguments

seg

Path to the GATK segment file.

cov

Path to the GATK coverage count file.

ai

Path to the DRAGEN BAF bedgraph file.

gender

Character, "male" or "female".

out_dir

Output directory path.

prefix

Output file prefix.

aibinsize

Numeric, AI bin size (default: 500000).

mergeai

Numeric, BAF difference threshold for merging segments (default: 0.2).

mergecov

Numeric, CNV difference threshold for merging segments (default: 0.2).

minaisize

Numeric, smallest AI segment size (default: 1000000).

snpmin

Numeric, minimum SNPs for BAF segmentation (default: 7).

minsnpcallaicutoff

Numeric, minimum SNPs for reliable CNLOH/GAINLOH (default: 10).

mergecovminsize

Numeric, minimum size for GATK segment merge (default: 500000).

Value

Invisibly returns the output file path.
